markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mortic](/Traits.aspx?ID=357)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 309</row>

Mortics are living [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) with close ties to [undeath](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). They have [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), and vulnerabilities to sacred ground, and they can become undead by holding their breath.
name: Mortic
